ViewObject.Name: InvoiceSourceLovVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select tv.target_value1 invoice_source from xx_fin_translatevalues tv ,xx_fin_translatedefinition td where tv.TRANSLATE_ID = td.TRANSLATE_ID AND tv.enabled_flag='Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN tv.start_date_active and NVL(tv.end_date_active,sysdate) AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM ap_supplier_sites_all site, ap_invoices_all ai, (SELECT /*+ INDEX(aph XX_AP_HOLDS_N1) */ distinct aph.invoice_id FROM ap_holds_all aph WHERE aph.creation_date > '01-JAN-11' AND NVL(aph.status_flag,'S')= 'S' ) h WHERE ai.invoice_id=h.invoice_id AND ai.invoice_num not like '%ODDBUIA' AND ai.creation_date>'01-JAN-11' AND ai.cancelled_date IS NULL AND ai.source=tv.target_value1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 'x' FROM mtl_system_items_b msi, po_lines_all pl WHERE pl.po_header_id = NVL(ai.po_header_id,ai.quick_po_header_id) AND msi.inventory_item_id = pl.item_id AND msi.organization_id+0 = 441 ) AND site.vendor_site_id=ai.vendor_site_id AND exists (SELECT 'x' FROM xx_fin_translatevalues tv, xx_fin_translatedefinition td WHERE td.translation_name = 'XX_AP_TRADE_CATEGORIES' AND tv.translate_id = td.translate_id AND tv.enabled_flag = 'Y' AND sysdate between tv.start_date_active and nvl(tv.end_date_active,sysdate) AND tv.target_value1 = site.attribute8) ) AND td.TRANSLATION_NAME = 'XX_AP_TR_MATCH_INVOICES'
